Title: Relates to involuntary emergency admission of persons alleged to be mentally ill
Summary: Enacts "Jesse's law" to provide that a person subject to involuntary emergency admission for immediate observation, care, and treatment of mental illness shall have the right to select the hospital they are admitted to.
LawCode: Add ยง9.42, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to involuntary emergency admission of persons alleged to be mentally ill
